from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, max, coalesce, trunc
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
from pyspark.sql import functions as F


#dla warstwy Bronze (ADLS Gen2)
bronze_bucket_name = "abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/"
bronze_prefix = "Erp/"

orders_path = f"{bronze_bucket_name}{bronze_prefix}orders"
order_details_path = f"{bronze_bucket_name}{bronze_prefix}order_details"

# Definicja ścieżek dla warstwy Silver (ADLS Gen2)
silver_bucket_name = "abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/"
silver_prefix = "f_sales/"

silver_path = f"{silver_bucket_name}{silver_prefix}"
silver_customers = f"{silver_bucket_name}d_customers"

# Załaduj dane z ADLS (tabele orders, order_details, customers)
orders_df = spark.read.parquet(orders_path)
order_details_df = spark.read.parquet(order_details_path)
customers_df = spark.read.parquet(silver_customers)

# Wyświetlenie pierwszych wierszy dla weryfikacji
orders_df.show(5)
order_details_df.show(5)
customers_df.show(5)



orders_df = orders_df.withColumn(
    "order_date", trunc("order_date","month")
).withColumn(
    "required_date", trunc("required_date","month")
).withColumn(
    "shipped_date", trunc("shipped_date","month")
)


joined_df = orders_df.join(order_details_df, "order_id").join(customers_df,"customer_id")

# Użycie okna do filtrowania najnowszych zamówień
latest_order_df = joined_df.withColumn(
    "max_order_date", F.max("order_date").over(Window.partitionBy("order_id"))
).filter(F.col("order_date") == F.col("max_order_date"))

# Wybór odpowiednich kolumn do zapisania w warstwie Silver
new_order_details_df = latest_order_df.select(
    "country_id",
    "product_id",  
    "shipped_date", 
    "unit_price", 
    "quantity", 
    "discount"
)


aggregated_df = new_order_details_df.groupBy("country_id", "product_id", "shipped_date").agg(
                                     F.sum("quantity").alias("quantity"),
                                     F.sum("discount").alias("discount"),
                                     F.round(F.sum(F.col("quantity") * F.col("unit_price")),2).alias("amount"),
                                     F.round((F.sum(F.col("quantity") * F.col("unit_price")) / F.sum("quantity")),2).alias("unit_price"))


# Sprawdzenie, czy tabela Silver już istnieje
try:
    silver_df = spark.read.parquet(silver_path)
    silver_exists = True
except:
    silver_exists = False


# Jeśli tabela Silver istnieje, wykonaj operację "MERGE" na podstawie DataFrame
if silver_exists:
    # Załaduj dane z tabeli Silver
    silver_df = spark.read.parquet(silver_path)
    
    # Połącz dane Silver z nowymi danymi (na podstawie order_id, customer_id, product_id)
    merged_df = silver_df.alias("silver").join(
        aggregated_df.alias("new_orders"),
        (F.col("silver.shipped_date") == F.col("new_orders.shipped_date")) & 
        (F.col("silver.country_id") == F.col("new_orders.country_id")) & 
        (F.col("silver.product_id") == F.col("new_orders.product_id")),
        how="outer"
    )

    # Wybór kolumn, które mają zostać zaktualizowane lub dodane
    final_df = merged_df.select(
        F.coalesce("new_orders.country_id", "silver.country_id").alias("country_id"),
        F.coalesce("new_orders.product_id", "silver.product_id").alias("product_id"),
        F.coalesce("new_orders.shipped_date", "silver.shipped_date").alias("shipped_date"), 
        F.coalesce("new_orders.quantity", "silver.quantity").alias("quantity"),
        F.coalesce("new_orders.discount", "silver.discount").alias("discount"),
        F.coalesce("new_orders.amount", "silver.amount").alias("amount"),
       F.coalesce("new_orders.unit_price", "silver.unit_price").alias("unit_price")
    )

    # Zapisanie zaktualizowanego DataFrame do warstwy Silver

    final_df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(silver_path)

else:

    # Zapisanie zaktualizowanego DataFrame do warstwy Silver

    aggregated_df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(silver_path)

# Zakończenie
print("Inkrementalne ładowanie zakończone!")
